name: Puppy Paradise-Addictive Merge
description:
Puppy paradise, an lovely game with dogs theme . Start to merge you own dogs!

HOW TO PLAY:

Merge two of the same dog to create new one.
Idler earning, gain coin even when you are offline.
Use help from interesting booster to faster your progress.

FEATURES:

Well designed dogs breed to unlock.
Upgrade them to unlock more cute puppies.
Inspiring development model, awesome merge games.
Lovely dog town scene design.

Have you ever wanted to have your own puppy but can't achieve it so far?
Do you have what it takes to be the best dog town out there?

Buy, merge and manage your very own dog town. Start by getting small puppies, then upgrade them into bigger faster dogs so you can make them racing to earn coins!

Be ready to discover new dog breeds, put them to the race, crush the tournament in this idle tycoon game.

Merge dogs, build the ultimate dog racing team and win the race! Download Puppy paradise and start your dog town today!
